all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Nevertheless, Zion shall escape if she observe to do all things whatsoever I have commanded her.
Doctrine and Covenants 97:25
Quote of the Day
"Your repentance doesn’t burden Jesus Christ; it brightens His joy."
Sister Tamara W. Runia | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
